about.team_info: Led by Dr. Shwan, our team is committed to excellence in orthodontic care.

questions.question: What is orthodontics?
questions.answer: Orthodontics is a branch of dentistry that deals with correcting teeth and jaw alignment.

questions.question: When should my child see an orthodontist?
questions.answer: It is recommended that children see an orthodontist by age 7 to identify any potential issues early.

questions.question: Do braces hurt?
questions.answer: There might be some discomfort when braces are first applied or adjusted, but this usually goes away after a few days.

questions.question: What are clear aligners?
questions.answer: Clear aligners are transparent, removable orthodontic devices used to straighten teeth.

questions.question: How long does orthodontic treatment take?
questions.answer: The duration of treatment varies depending on the individual case but typically ranges from 1 to 3 years.

questions.question: Can adults get braces?
questions.answer: Yes, orthodontic treatment is effective for both children and adults.

questions.question: How often do I need to visit the orthodontist during treatment?
questions.answer: Usually every 4-8 weeks, depending on the treatment plan.
